name: Snow break  in Val Thorens, the French ski resort that offers the best of skiing
description:
Discover the gourmet resort Val Thorens in the French Alps, you will be accommodated in the Junior Suite of a charming 5-stars hotel. 

After a scrumptious breakfast you will spend the day in the snow with a ski instructor and enjoy the magnificent mountain view. 

In the evening you can just relax and take advantage of the hotel’s wellness area which includes a swimming pool, a hammam and a sauna or you can have a good time in the luxurious bar of the hotel. Just lay back and watch us make your stay a an extraordinary experience.

dayProgram.title: Geneva Airport - Val Thorens
dayProgram.description:
Transfert from the Geneva Airport to the Val Thorens ski station


You will be met at the Geneva Airport and then you will have a private transfer to Val Thorens.



Discover the ski resort of Val Thorens


Val Thorens is a state of mind. A state of mind of attitude and altitude. It is the resort that combines the best of skiing with the best of ambiences.


Relaxed, lively and gourmet, here you can evolve according to your desires, at your own pace, multiply your experiences, conviviality is essential. The ultimate goal: to feel alive!


Warm atmospheres, a breathtaking nature, without barriers or borders, here come together those who want and know that height rhymes with colour and pleasure!



Skiwear and accessories Rental


Your all-inclusive prestige ski outfit will be delivered to your hotel on the day your arrival.


Following outfit will be at your disposal during your stay: jacket, trousers, goggles, gloves (we need to collect your measurements for the jacket, trousers and gloves).


At the end of your stay you can drop the gear at your hotel.


Duration: 3 to 4 days



Ski equipment rental nearby your stay

﻿

Rent the newest equipment each season, for enjoyable high-performance skiing from the ski shop near your resort. The pack includes a pair of skis (or snowboard), boots and helmet.

(Rossignol Sky 7 HD, Atomic Redster S9, K2 Pinnacle RX, Dynastar Speed Zone 9 Ca, Salomon S/Max 10 or similar)

Non- included: damage and theft insurance


Duration: Rental for 3 days

﻿

﻿



Overnight stay, breakfast and dinner in the Junior Suite of a 5 stars hotel in Val Thorens

dayProgram.title: Val Thorens
dayProgram.description:
Ski pass - Les 3 Vallées


Take advantage of your 3-days pass to discover the 3 Vallées ski area.


Included: Ski areas Val Thorens-Orelle, Les Menuires-St Martin de Belleville, Méribel, La Tania, Brides les Bains, Courchevel (600km of slopes).


﻿

Full day Ski Guiding


Discover the best snow and the best restaurants without having to look at the piste map with an Official Ski Guide!


Our fully qualified Ski Guides know the ski areas perfectly and will take you to the slopes that allow you to shine, whilst also finding the best snow conditions on the mountain.


Whenever you’re with a Official Ski Guide, you get lift queue priority !


Duration: Full Day from 09:15 to 16:30

﻿


﻿


Overnight stay, breakfast and dinner in the Junior Suite of a 5 stars hotel in Val Thorens

dayProgram.title: Val Thorens - Geneva Airport
dayProgram.description:
Transfer from the Val Thorens ski resort to the Geneva Airport


At your meeting point at the ski resort of Val Thorens, a private driver will pick you up and take you to the Geneva airport.



﻿End of our service


Your journey with us has come to an end. We hope to see you soon!
